attributes.action: Stop betting companies restricting winning accounts
attributes.additional_details: Betting companies often restrict winning betting accounts. Even if they’ve only won a small amount of money. Some companies restrict accounts the same day they are opened. They do not do the same to losing accounts. This is unfair and if a betting company offers odd then the amount people want to stake should not face restrictions. If you lose money regularly these restrictions are not placed on losing accounts and this is unfair.
attributes.background: Stop betting companies restricting peoples accounts if they win some money.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for individual businesses.
